result.eng: There is a picture of you on the cover of the magazine.
result.ga: Tá pictiúr díot ar chlúdach na hirise
result.orig: Tá pictiúr díot ar chlúdach na hirise
result.html: Tá pictiúr díot ar chlúdach na hiriseThere is a picture of you on the cover of the magazine.
result.ponchtml: Tá pictiúr díot ar ċlúdaċ na hiriseThere is a picture of you on the cover of the magazine.

result.eng: He took the picture off the wall.
result.ga: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.orig: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.html: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhallaHe took the picture off the wall.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé an pictiúr den ḃallaHe took the picture off the wall.

result.eng: He hung the picture on the wall.

result.orig: Chroch sé an pictiúr ar an bhalla
result.html: Chroch sé an pictiúr ar an bhallaHe hung the picture on the wall.
result.ponchtml: Ċroċ sé an pictiúr ar an ḃallaHe hung the picture on the wall.

result.html: Taitníonn an pictiúr liomI like the picture.
